description: This file defines a React functional component named 'ProductGrid' which renders a grid of products using the 'ProductCard' component. It takes props for a list of products and callback functions for adding products and error handling.

methods.name: ProductGrid({ products, onAdd, onError })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a grid of product cards, accepting products array, onAdd callback, and onError callback as props.
